category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_configured_export_optionset
preference.preference_description: Defines the default option for TC XML export of configured Product Structures. A valid value is the internal name of a "Transfer Option Set", which can be found in the "PLM XML Import Export Administration" application.
